fields.label: Type
fields.description: Valfritt medieelement. Elementet vil bli plassert over spørsmålet.

semantics.label: Oppgåvebeskriving
semantics.description: Forklar korleis brukeren skal løyse oppgaven.
semantics.default: Dra orda inn i dei rette boksane

semantics.label: Tekst
semantics.placeholder: *Oslo* er hovudstaden i Noreg, *Stockholm* er hovudstaden i Sverige og *København* er hovudstaden i Danmark. Alle byane er lokalisert i *Skandinavia:Nordlege delen av europa*.

important.description:
• Droppable words are added with an asterisk (*) in front and behind the correct word/phrase.
  • You may add a textual tip, using a colon (:) in front of the tip.
  • For every empty spot there is only one correct word.
  • You may add feedback to be displayed when a task is completed. Use '\+' for correct and '\-' for incorrect feedback.
important.example:
H5P content may be edited using a *browser:What type of program is Chrome?*.
H5P content is *interactive\+Correct! \-Incorrect, try again!*

fields.label: Opprett poengområde og legg inn tilbakemeldingar.
fields.description: Klikk på knappen "Legg til poengområde" og legg til så mange poengområde du treng. Døme: 0–40 % Svakt resultat, 41–80 % Gjennomsnittleg resultat, 81–100 % Flott resultat!

semantics.label: Nummerert slippsone merkelapp
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read the index of a drop zone. Variable available: @index

semantics.label: Tom slippsone merkelapp
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read that the drop zone is empty

semantics.label: Contains Drop Zone label
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker will read that the drop zone contains a draggable

semantics.label: Nummerert merkelapp for element som kan dras
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker reads that this is a draggable element. Variable available: @index, @count

semantics.label: Ingen slippsone valg-merkelapp
semantics.description: Label used for accessibility, where the Read speaker reads it before the tip is read out

semantics.label: Bekreftelsesdialogtittel om at brukeren vil nullstille et flyttbart element
Bekreftelsesdialogbeskrivelse om at brukeren vil nullstille et flyttbart element
semantics.default: Er du sikker på at du vil nullstille dette elementet?

semantics.label: Merkelapp for universal utforming, når brukeren indikerer at dragning har startet
LMerkelapp for universal utforming, når brukeren indikerer at dragnig er avbrutt
Innstillinger for oppgave-åtferd
semantics.description: Disse instillingene lar deg bestemme hvordan oppgavetypen skal oppføre seg.

semantics.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Assistive technology label for "Check" button
semantics.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

semantics.label: Assistive technology label for "Show Solution" button
semantics.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

semantics.label: Assistive technology label for "Retry" button
semantics.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
